contest-event.event-date:
June 18, 2011 D West of England Bandsmen's Festival (Championship Section)
West of England Bandsmen's Festival (Championship Section) 1 Test Piece Contest West of England Bandsmen's Festival (Bugle) west-of-england-bandsmans-festival-class-a
Carnival Overture [Dvořák, arr. Brand]
Molinnis Park, Bugle, Cornwall, England, UK Hymn ('Ave Verum', Mozart, arr. Jakeway): 1 Mount Charles, 96 2 St. Dennis, 93 3 Camborne, 92 4 Foresters, 90
Best Player Award: Kayleigh Mitchell (Cornet) - Camborne
Best Soprano: Les Kneebone, Camborne Town Best Solo Cornet: Kayleigh Mitchell, Camborne Town Best Euphonium: Robert Jose, Camborne Town Best Solo Horn: Sarah Whitehead, Mount Charles Best Set of Basses: Foresters Brass 2000
A. R. TRUDGIAN YOUTH AWARDS: Yasmin Stevens - St Austell, Dominic Turner - Camborne Brass
Deportment (judge Gareth Roberts): 1 Bugle (2nd Section) 2 Okehampton (4th Section)
June 19, 2011, 12:52 p.m. Aug. 7, 2013, 1:31 p.m.
1 Camborne Town Band Kevin MacKenzie
2 St. Dennis Band Darren Hawken
3 Mount Charles Brass Band John Maines
4 Foresters Brass Peter Collins
